headline: Intuit strikes $100 million deal to integrate OpenAI models into financial tools
summary: Shares of the Mountain View, California-based company rose 3.4% in premarket trading following the announcement.  The company said its tools such as personal ⁠finance portal Credit Karma ‌and accounting software QuickBooks will be directly accessible through ChatGPT, enabling users to get instant ‍financial decisions such as estimating tax refunds, personal loans or mortgage, all within the chatbot experience.  Intuit CEO Sasan Goodarzi said the ​partnership combines the company's "proprietary financial data,‌ credit models and AI platform capabilities with OpenAI's scale and frontier models to give users the financial advantage they need to prosper".

The company said its tools such as personal ⁠finance portal Credit Karma ‌and accounting software QuickBooks will be directly accessible through ChatGPT, enabling users to get instant ‍financial decisions such as estimating tax refunds, personal loans or mortgage, all within the chatbot experience.  Intuit CEO Sasan Goodarzi said the ​partnership combines the company's "proprietary financial data,‌ credit models and AI platform capabilities with OpenAI's scale and frontier models to give users the financial advantage they need to prosper".

headline: Intuit shares gain on OpenAI partnership to create financial apps
summary: Investing.com -- Intuit Inc shares are trading roughly 6% higher in pre-market on Tuesday after announcing a multi-year strategic partnership with OpenAI to develop financial intelligence applications within ChatGPT.

headline: Intuit Inks Deal to Spend Over $100 Million on OpenAI Models
summary: In addition to the new spending commitment, Intuit will offer applications inside ChatGPT that let users access and interact with financial data stored within Intuit’s platform.  The deal will combine “the power of Intuit’s proprietary financial data, credit models, and AI platform capabilities with OpenAI’s scale and frontier models to give users the financial advantage they need to prosper,” said Intuit Chief Executive Officer Sasan Goodarzi in a statement.

headline: OpenAI, Intuit Strike Strategic Partnership
summary: OpenAI and Intuit agreed to a partnership in which the fintech firm will deepen its use of OpenAI models and make applications available on the artificial intelligence company’s ChatGPT.

raw.headline: OpenAI, Intuit Strike Strategic Partnership
raw.summary: OpenAI and Intuit agreed to a partnership in which the fintech firm will deepen its use of OpenAI models and make applications available on the artificial intelligence company’s ChatGPT.

headline: Intuit signs $100M+ deal with OpenAI to bring its apps to ChatGPT
summary: Intuit said its tools, such as TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks and Mailchimp, will be accessible through ChatGPT, allowing users to ask questions and complete tasks such as estimating tax refunds, reviewing credit options, or managing business finances.

raw.headline: Intuit signs $100M+ deal with OpenAI to bring its apps to ChatGPT
raw.summary: Intuit said its tools, such as TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks and Mailchimp, will be accessible through ChatGPT, allowing users to ask questions and complete tasks such as estimating tax refunds, reviewing credit options, or managing business finances.
